attributes.action: Impliment a national pay and career structure for Nursery Nurses and TAs that is commensurate with qualification, skills, ability and the huge responsibility undertaken when caring for and educating children.”
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Through the implimentation of single status, nursery Nurses and TAs across the country have had their pay slashed, in some cases by up to £331 per month. Each authority decides on pay and conditions. We need a national pay structure to compensate for the hugh pay cuts and changes in conditions.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Impliment a national pay and career structure for Nursery Nurses and TAs that is commensurate with qualification, skills, ability and the huge responsibility undertaken when caring for and educating children."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13035.asp

Prime Minister's Office
